Code:
EXEC SQL  SELECT COD_EMPRESA, NUM_FATURACOD_SUREG
FROM seguros.v1crediapol
 
WHERE NUM_APOLICE       = :NUM_APOLICE
AND   COD_SUREG         = :COD_SUREG
AND   COD_AGENCIA       = :COD_AGENCIA
AND   CODOPER           = :CODOPER
AND   NUM_CONTRATO      = :NUM_CONTRATO
AND   CONTRATO_DIGITO   = :CONTRATO_DIGITO
AND   RAMO              = :RAMO
AND   DTINIVIG         <= :DTINIVIG
AND   DTTERVIG         >= :DTTERVIG
;AND   SITUACAO          IN  ('1','A','3','B')
AND   TIMESTAMP        = 
(SELECT MAX(TIMESTAMP)
 FROM SEGUROS.seguros.v1crediapol
WHERE NUM_APOLICE       = :NUM_APOLICE
AND   COD_SUREG         = :COD_SUREG
AND   COD_AGENCIA       = :COD_AGENCIA
AND   CODOPER           = :CODOPER
AND   NUM_CONTRATO      = :NUM_CONTRATO
AND   CONTRATO_DIGITO   = :CONTRATO_DIGITO
AND   RAMO              = :RAMO
AND   DTINIVIG         <= :DTINIVIG
AND   DTTERVIG         >= :DTTERVIG)
;/
 END SQL
